overview: The story is about three friends, Ghaint, Abs, and Lehri who are living a normal life. Ghaint, who's real name is Deep Kainth falls into a huge trouble when he finds out that there is a man in the city with the same name as of his, and is very rich. A don of the city is behind the rich Deep Kainth of the city for extortion money.
title: MySelf Ghaint
